fasper.base
Interface ParserActivation

All Known Subinterfaces:
TestActivation
All Known Implementing Classes:
GMActivation
public interface ParserActivation

Common interface for all parser activation. It offers a common way to activate parsers and retrieve the resulted AST's. It also is able to return a token map and a list of errors.

See Also:
TestActivation, GMActivation

Method Summary
 void activate()
          Activates the parser.
 ArrayList getAllErrors()
          Returns the list of errors which may appear during parsing process.
 AST getParserAST()
          Returns parser AST.
 HashMap getTokenMap()
          Returns a token map of the parser under test.
 AST getTreeParserAST()
          Returns tree parser AST.

getAllErrors

ArrayList getAllErrors()
Returns the list of errors which may appear during parsing process. This is very usefull if your parser handles multiple errors.

Returns:
ArrayList contains the reported errors.
